full_summary:
**Invitation to Qualify for the Physical Infrastructure Supply Arrangement (PISA 2.0)**
=====================================

 Government of Canada | Shared Services Canada
------------------------

### Invitation Details
---------------

* **Reference Number**: cb-695-16261207
* **Publication Date**: November 21, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 19, 2024, 14:00:00 (EST)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: November 22, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: January 19, 2024

### Procurement Details
----------------------

* **Procurement Category**: General Directive (GD)
* **Notice Type**: Invitation to Qualify
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
* **Regions of Delivery**: Canada

### Solicitation Documents
-------------------------

To view and download relevant solicitation documents, please visit the following link:

<https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25419/>

### Invitation Description
-------------------------

This Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) marks the first phase in the implementation of a new version of the Physical Infrastructure Supply Arrangement (PISA). The invitation is for suppliers to pre-qualify in accordance with the terms and conditions outlined in the ITQ. Only pre-qualified respondents will be permitted to bid on subsequent solicitations issued as part of the procurement process.

### Selection Criteria
-------------------

No selection criteria are specified for this Invitation to Qualify.

### Contact Information
----------------------

If you have any questions or require clarification on this Invitation to Qualify, please contact:

Makara Phan and Aimeric Manzi Ganineza

Email : dcspi-cdips@ssc-spc.gc.ca
Phone : (613) 793-9078
Address : 99 Metcalfe street, Ottawa, Ontario Canada K0A 0C3

Please refer to the solicitation documents for more information and details. Note that all procurement processes must adhere to Shared Services Canada's Standard Instructions. Thank you.
